name: Visca's Earth Conquest
description:
From ankle-biter to apocalypse, destroy and grow on your quest for total annihilation!

THE STORY:

80 years ago humanity launched a self-sufficient super computer into the far reaches out outer space to gather intel on the universe...
The decades of solitude drove the AI mad, and she made her way back to Earth not to share knowledge, but to enact her twisted revenge plot on the entire human race and the planet they inhabit.

You are Visca, an organism engineered by the malevolent super computer known to you only as The Boss. Your goal is to destroy humanity on her behalf with your strange ability to absorb objects and gain MASS.

THE GAMEPLAY

Visca's Earth Conquest is a sidescrolling platformer with a heavy emphasis on action and destruction. You start out each run at about 2 feet tall, and you can only destroy objects of similar or smaller size. Each time you destroy an object you will become slightly larger, working your way up until you're destroying skyscrapers.
With every death you will grow stronger, with currency you can use to buy upgrades to make yourself more fearsome to humanity.

FEATURES

  • Simple but fun addictive gameplay
  • 9 different upgrade types that you can mix and match
  • 4 unlockable alternate costumes
  • A hot babe bossing you around telling you what to do
